261712.「キーーッ！ ママナンテ ダイキライ！\n ニクイ ニクイッ！ ユルサナインダカ:
Keeeeeeeeeee! Mama nante dai kirai! Nicey,
nicey, nicey! Yulusana in dakarak!

261714.「ママ キライ！ キライ！\n アタシノ リボン カエシテヨッ！:
Mommy, I hate you! I hate you! My ribbon,
please!

261715.<cs_pchero>は ボロボロのリボンを\nソノラに 差し出した！:
<cs_pchero> offered the Tattered Ribbon to
Sonora!

261718.「あたし……リボンのことで\n ママに ひどいこと たくさん言っちゃった。\n:
I... said a lot of terrible things to Mom
about the ribbon. I'm sorry, Mom...

261720.「ごめんなさい ソノラ……！\n あのリボンが あなたにとって\n 大切なものだ:
I'm sorry, Sonora...! I didn't know that
ribbon meant so much to you.

261721.「こんなにもつらい 悲しい思いをさせて\n ごめんなさい。バカなママを\n どう:
I'm sorry for causing you so much pain and
sadness. Please forgive my stupid mom...

261722.「……このリボンはね。グランゼドーラに\n 来る前に お友達にもらったの。\n:
...this ribbon. A friend gave it to me before I came to Gran Zedora. She said that even though we are apart, I will always remember
you.

261723.「だから なくなったときは\n すごく悲しかったし 心が真っ黒になって\n 苦し:
That's why I was so sad when I lost it, and my
heart turned black and bitter. But...

261724.<if_woman>「リボン 戻ってきて よかった！\n あたしは もう大丈夫だ:
<if_woman>Ribbon, I'm glad you're back! I'm fine now.
Thanks lady!<else>Ribbon, I'm glad you're back! I'm fine now.
Thanks mister!<endif>

261725.「ぬるい手に こだわりやがって。\n あのガキが 正気を取り戻さなかったら\n:
You stuck to your lukewarm hand. What were you
going to do if the kid didn't come to his
senses?

261726.「あ～ぁ。本当に もったいない。\n せっかく あの子供に 絶望を植えつけて\n:
Ahh~. What a waste. I've brought that kid up
this far by instilling despair in him, and now
I've ruined it...

261727.「フフッ……はじめまして！\n ワタクシ 邪毒のウィーヌムと申します。\n 新米:
Hmph... nice to meet you! My name is Wienum,
the Wienum of Evil Poison. A new demon
swordsman <cs_pchero>?

261728.「先日の贈り物 気に入っていただけました？\n なつかしき 故郷の皆さまとの再会:
Did you like my gift the other day? It must
have been a very touching reunion with all of
you from your old hometowns!

261729.「お久しぶりですね ディゼルさん。\n しばらく見ないうちに ずいぶん\n 魔の:
It's been a long time, Mr. Diezel. It seems
that your demon wave has grown quite a bit in
the time since I've seen you.

261730.「……ようやく 貴様にたどり着けた。\n 子供のころから 何度 夢見てきたか。\:
At last I have found you. How many times have
I dreamed of you since I was a child? I am so
happy that my stomach is boiling.

261731.「貴様を殺す！ 八つ裂きにしてやる！！: I will kill you! I will tear you to pieces!

261732.「ウフッ！ ワタクシもうれしいですよ。\n アナタがそんなにも 魔の波動を\n:
Woohoo! I'm happy too. You've brought up the
magic vibes so deliciously...

261733.「あの 忌々しい魔剣士に つけられたキズも癒え\n ようやく 活動できるようにな:
The wound inflicted by that damned demon
swordsman has healed, and I am finally able to
work.

261734.「やっと アナタの魔の波動を食べられる……と\n 楽しみにしていたのですが 熟し:
I was looking forward to finally eating
Anata's magical vibrations, but I guess it's
just one step away from ripening...

261735.「フフフフ……<cs_pchero>さん！\n 先に アナタをいただくのも あり:
<cs_pchero>! I think I'll have you first.
Your vibes look pretty Umauma too!

261736.「そのときのために\n しかるべき 舞台を用意しておくとします。\n ……また:
I will prepare a proper stage for that time.
...I'll see you again<heart>

261738.「俺は お前のような甘いヤツは 認めない。\n ……だが どうやら ヤツは\n:
I don't approve of sweet guys like you. But
apparently he's taken an interest in you.

261739.「お前は ヤツをおびき寄せるための エサだ。\n せいぜい 役に立ってもらうぞ…:
You're just bait to lure him in. You'll be
useful to us...
